page.title: 08Lucy Baldwin's Saturday
page.content: It's Saturday! I lie in bed until 9.00 a.m,then I get up and watch television.After that I have breakfast which usually consists of toast and cereal.At 10.00 a.m I receive my one pound pocket money and my Dad drives me down to the newsagents.I buy a magazine and some bubble gum and then we go home. I have lunch at 1.00 p.m of sausages and chips with a lot of tomato ketchup.During the afternoon I read a supernatural book.Then it's television time!!! I watch many programmes such as Dynasty,Wonder Woman and Battle beyond the Planets. Last of all I go to bed at 10.00 p.m and read.
